info.description:
=======================
Sale Product Returnable
=======================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png

    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

This module allows you to set some product as returnable and creates a
return when the sales order is confirmed.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

* Go to Inventory > Master Data > Products
* Create or select a product (like Bottle of Water)
* Go to the Inventory tab
* Edit the product to check the box "Can be returned?"
* Select the product to be returned (Empty Bottle)

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/sale-workflow/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/sale-workflow/issues/new?body=module:%20sale_product_returnable%0Aversion:%2012.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
